Title: Designates the second Monday in July each year as a public holiday, to be known as Abolition Commemoration day
Summary: Designates the second Monday in July each year as a public holiday, to be known as Abolition Commemoration Day.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, in relation to the designation of Abolition Commemoration day as a public holiday
